Phase - Enum in BackEnd
This enum class holds the phases that each player is in.

PickPlayerController - Class in FrontEnd
After game setup, show numbers of choiceBox to let players select a player profile for different players, set these files to an ArrayList for gameBoard to use and run.

Profile - Class in BackEnd

ProfilesController - Class in FrontEnd
A controller class for profiles.fxml which allows a user to show the player profiles saved, create new player profiles, delete player profiles and view player profiles.
